Not your usual ball game!

Arcade action game of amazing races against time to play forever on your iPhone / iPod Touch.

Control the ball using the accelerometer and the touch screen.
Supports listening to your iPod music while in game.
Awesome 3D graphics, beautiful sounds FX and music, and superb physics are the winning key for this great marble game.

Zero Version Features:

- 3 tracks from the world: East
- Real time superb physics
- Play the tracks with different racing styles
- Excellent music and sound effects
- Accelerometer and touch screen controls
- Full 3D accelerated OGL ES graphic

Full version features also:

- 32 challenging tracks + New space world level pack with 8 new tracks
- 5 beautiful worlds: East, South, West, North and Space
- Many physics-based challenges: police chase, parking lot, jumps, mills and carousels!
- Rechargeable hydrogen "nitro" boost allows you to make crazy shortcuts!
- New "marbles" to play with: Softball, Basketball, Golfball, Pinball, Beachball, RedMarble
- Bonus to improve your race time
- OpenFeint leaderboards achievements and challenges
- GameCenter Achievements

Zero version Instructions
---------------------
Movements: tilt gently the device in the 4 directions to guide the ball.
Jump: make the ball jump by touching anywhere the screen.
Calibration: during a game, touch gently the top right corner

Tips:
Face always the slopes with almost no speed, or you will easily fall out of the track.
Use boost when there is a straight long part of the course, be ready for the curves!
The jump is NOT broken, of course you won't jump when the ball is already in the air.
